name: Mixpost
title: mixpost.app
shortDescription: Mixpost is a self-hosted, open-source tool designed for managing social media content across various platforms. It allows users to create, schedule, publish, and manage posts from a single interface. Ideal for marketers and businesses looking to enhance their social media presence without recurring costs. For example, a small business can use Mixpost to schedule weekly posts across all major social platforms, improving engagement without needing multiple tools.
cons: Limited customer support compared to SaaS

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Buffer
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Simple UI and good analytics tools
